channel.title: Whonix 15.0.1.5.1 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
channel.description:
This is a [point release](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release).
Download Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox
----
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Operating_System_Software_and_Updates
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute
----
# Notable Changes
Whonix VirtualBox:
* use the [Recommended VirtualBox version for use with Whonix](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Recommended_Version), VirtualBox version `6.1.14` * ([information on VirtualBox Guest Additions](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Guest_Additions#VirtualBox_Guest_Additions)) * ([VirtualBox Guest Additions ISO Freedom vs Non-Freedom](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/VirtualBox#VirtualBox_Guest_Additions_ISO_Freedom_vs_Non-Freedom)) * upgrade VirtualBox guest additions to version `6.1.14` * `vm-config-dist`: run [ `vbox-guest-installer` ](https://gitlab.com/whonix/vm-config-dist/-/blob/master/usr/bin/vbox-guest-installer) when package [`virtualbox-guest-additions-iso`](https://packages.debian.org/virtualbox-guest-additions-iso) is updated
Whonix:
* Whonix-Workstation Firewall: add configuration option `firewall_allow_udp=true` to allow outgoing UDP * binaries-freedom: upgrade Bitcoin electrum wallet to version `4.0.3` * anon-apps-config: Skip setting timezone to UTC if file `/etc/noutc` or `/usr/local/etc/noutc` exists, [document how to change system timezone](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Timezone) * tb-updater: upgrade Tor Browser to version `9.5.4`
----

https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/15.0.1.4.8-developers-only...15.0.1.5.1-developers-only
